player.comment: I'm reporting in for patrol duty.
I found the pirate base and scanned it.
We ran into ships which looked like Terraformers!
We need to inform the USC
I would like to take part in the escort.
I am very interested in working for your race.
No problem. What is the plan?
I don't understand. Are'nt you at war with the Terrans?

conversation.name: L2M020_Gili_Tosi_1
conversation.description: AP HUB Plot Gili Tosi 1 - NPC page 211

npc.comment: We are pleased that you contacted us. Atreus has regular work for you.

conversation.name: L2M020_Gili_Tosi_2
conversation.description: AP HUB Plot Gili Tosi 2 - NPC page 211

npc.comment: We are pleased that you contacted us. Push to intercept and eliminate all hostile ships.

conversation.name: L2M020_Gili_Tosi_3
conversation.description: AP HUB Plot Gili Tosi 3 - NPC page 211

npc.comment: Good enough, but far from perfect. In future, try a little harder. I do indeed have another job for you.

conversation.name: L2M020_Muli_Nilo_1
conversation.description: AP HUB Plot Muli Nilo 1 - NPC page 210

npc.comment: This is far from acceptable, pilot. We are not amused.

npc.comment: What do you demand of the Split?
For what reason do you contact this Split Commander?
We have no time for you! You go!
I'm looking for someone to work for me.
We have no time for talk, only profit!
Is there something I can help you with?
Is there something I can help you with?
Are you wanting something from the Split?
Would you choose to take further profit from this job?
Would you choose to take further profit from this job?

We have no time for talk, only profit!

I look for a pilot who is not afraid of combat.
Are you wanting something from the Split?
Are you wanting something from the Split?
Are you wanting something from the Split?
Are you wanting something from the Split?
Are you wanting something from the Split?

You picked a bad time, sorry.
